messages.speech:
- Stacking/clustering BE4Ks are not recommended.
- BE4K does not support third-party SIP phones today.
- Video phones, DXs are not supported today. Support for 8845/65 phones is estimated for early June 2017. 
- 8821 wireless phones are on the roadmap.
- Jabber Phone Mode is not supported today. Estimated Nov 2017.
- No roadmap for Spark integration.
- No roadmap for customer care via integration with UCCX/UCCE/PCCE.
- VG202/204 analog gateways are not supported.
- ATA190 for analog FXS line support will be supported in June/July
- BE4k does not yet have the concept of a dial-plan and multiple trunks to route the calls in different ways. It is focused on single site needs, with a single trunk group.
